pkgmetadata.longdescription: # HTTPX-CACHE[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/obendidi/httpx-cache/branch/main/graph/badge.svg?token=FHHRA6F17X)](https://codecov.io/gh/obendidi/httpx-cache)httpx-cache is an implementation of the caching algorithms in [httplib2](https://github.com/httplib2/httplib2) and [CacheControl](https://github.com/ionrock/cachecontrol) for use with [httpx](https://github.com/encode/httpx) transport object.It is is heavily insipired by:- [https://github.com/ionrock/cachecontrol](https://github.com/ionrock/cachecontrol)- [https://github.com/johtso/httpx-caching](https://github.com/johtso/httpx-caching)## DocumentationFull documentation is available at [https://obendidi.github.io/httpx-cache/](https://obendidi.github.io/httpx-cache/)## InstallationUsing pip:```shpip install httpx-cache```_Please make sure to pin the exact `httpx-cache` version for your project, to make sure it all works._## ContributorsFeel free to contribute !
